title: anyone want to test my irc server?
content:
Hey guys. my friend and I both setup irc servers and linked them together. It has full services as well. I was wondering if anyone would like to test how stable it is.
my server is located in canada, british columbia (west side)
the server address is: irc.blueillusion.ath.cx
My other friends server is located in the usa, new york and his address is:
irc.dont.mine.nu

Come join me and other non keeners in #chat or make a channel for yourselves. i just want to see how many people we can hold on our home cable connections before it starts to lag heheh.

title: Re: anyone want to test my irc server?
content: I'm in it now, but nobody seems to be there...

title: Re: anyone want to test my irc server?
Re: anyone want to test my irc server?
content:
I may try it later today. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

What I'd like to do is an irc bot.. No idea how that stuff works, though..3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: anyone want to test my irc server?
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Blue: gotta join channels ^^[hr][/quote]
Haven't used IRC for a while. I figured it out eventually, though. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img]

title: Re: anyone want to test my irc server?
content:
keenrush as a irc bot you created yourself? or a server provided bot?
With the services i use, we can provide chanbots for you. But if you want a custom but you will provide your own. A good bot is an eggdrop.
[url=http://www.eggheads.org/]www.eggheads.org/[/url]
and a good support site, and script site for your bot is at:
[url=http://www.egghelp.org/]www.egghelp.org/[/url]

Both these run on *nix operating systems only i beleve. I use eggdrop for games on some of the channels im on at rizon.

title: Re: anyone want to test my irc server?
content:
I'm currently testing BlueIllusion. It was one of the fastest IRC server connections I ever encoutered.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] ___________________
DaVince, Yet Another Amateur Game Creator! :P
